titles.title: Small Business Outreach Act of 2003
To amend the Small Business Act to provide additional grants to small business development centers located in high unemployment districts.
Small Business Outreach Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: Small Business Outreach Act of 2003 - Amends the Small Business Act to authorize any applicant funded by the Small Business Administration (SBA) as a small business development center and located in a high unemployment district to apply for an additional grant to be used solely to promote SBA and other Federal programs that promote the growth and development of small businesses. Prohibits any single applicant from receiving more than $100,000 in SBA grants in a fiscal year. Provides a priority for applicants in districts with the highest unemployment rates.
